name: Getting started with Drasi
postStartCommand: if [ -n "$CODESPACE_NAME" ]; then echo 'GitHub Codespace detected. Waiting for ingress hello-world-debug-reaction-ingress...'; MAX_WAIT=1200; INTERVAL=5; ELAPSED=0; while [ $ELAPSED -lt $MAX_WAIT ]; do if kubectl get ingress hello-world-debug-reaction-ingress -n drasi-system &> /dev/null; then echo 'Ingress found, applying patch...'; if kubectl patch ingress hello-world-debug-reaction-ingress -n drasi-system --type=json --patch-file=./resources/ingress-codespace-patch.yaml; then echo 'Patch applied successfully'; kubectl get ingress hello-world-debug-reaction-ingress -n drasi-system -o yaml >> /tmp/ingress-patch.log 2>&1; exit 0; else echo 'Patch failed'; exit 1; fi; fi; echo "Waiting for ingress [$ELAPSED/$MAX_WAIT]"; sleep $INTERVAL; ELAPSED=$((ELAPSED + INTERVAL)); done; echo 'Timeout: Ingress not created after ${MAX_WAIT}s'; exit 1; fi
